Wichita_Falls.KWFS-FM:
KWFS-FM (branded as "102.3 The Bull") is a radio station serving the Wichita Falls area with a Modern Country format. It broadcasts on FM frequency 102.3 MHz and is under ownership of Townsquare Media.


== History ==
KNTO-FM, the first FM station in the Wichita Falls area, went on air in August 1961, owned by a partnership of five local businessmen including Bob Lipscomb, Bill Thacker, and three others, and the station's callsign stood for "North Texas and Oklahoma"..
